name: Math Snake
description:
This is a small educational game about quickly summing up numbers in your head.

The game starts off easy enough, but as you reach into higher levels, the snake will become faster, the numbers that give you hints will fade and you will need to do all the math in your head quickly, as it's meant to be!

Move with the arrow keys. The goal is to fetch cubes each level that add up to the golden number in the corner.

Let me know in the comments your high score! I have yet to break 100k. :D

Credits for great background music:

https://jdsherbert.itch.io/minigame-music-pack
